text: Two people are now confirmed dead after natural gas explosion that destroyed three row houses in Baltimore and sent seven people to the hospital. https://t.co/7KtteQA2gZ https://t.co/QDLRYENkBJ

name: ABC
text: In statement following selection as Joe Biden's running mate, Kamala Harris says, "I'm honored to join him as our party's nominee for Vice President, and do what it takes to make him our Commander-in-Chief." https://t.co/EvkIjvle4J https://t.co/TMLXT6vnyy

name: ABC
text: Smoke is seen billowing from the Grizzly Creek Fire burning in western Colorado, where flames spread so fast that Interstate 70 had to be shut in both directions. https://t.co/kiANOx4X9u https://t.co/dYjPHVIpPB

name: ABC
text: Rep. Jasmine Clark, a legislator who teaches at Emory University, explained technical aspects her family will have to consider amid virtual learning this fall, as she will use Zoom to lecture while her daughter will use it simultaneously to attend class. https://t.co/UC4aVKiMDP https://t.co/twgwNfQbaw

name: ABC
text: The family of Elijah McClain has filed a lawsuit against the city of Aurora, Colorado, that accuses several officers and paramedics of violating the 23-year-old's civil rights and negligently causing his death nearly a year ago. https://t.co/secW08V8R5

name: ABC
text: Simon Cowell's electric bike accident over the weekend has renewed e-bike safety concerns as sales soar across the country during the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/FcIS80QXqw
